text: (ebævin) kavurun (viniscaya kalayehi) allahge hamu vima boru karannoda, ovun niyata vasayenma parajitayin bavata patva giyaha. (balaporottu novu andamata) hadisiye ovunta viniscaya kalaya pæminiyahot, ovun tamange papayanhi bara tamange pita konda mata osava gat aya vasayen “meya (mema dinaya) api visvasa nokala (værædden) apata ætivu sokaya!” yayi edadavannaha. ovun osavagena æti dæya itamat napuru eva noveda
